key_findings: Israeli sources show highest THREAT framing (40%) - 6x higher than Al Jazeera/UK (6.7%)
Al Jazeera and UK sources strongly emphasize DIPLOMATIC framing (60% each) vs Israeli (26.7%)
Israeli sources are only outlet with significant CONFLICT framing (20%) anticipating military action
Israeli sources completely lack DOMESTIC coverage (0%) - no attention to Iranian internal events
US mainstream shows balanced but threat-leaning coverage: 40% DIPLOMATIC, 33% THREAT
UK and US mainstream are only sources with substantial DOMESTIC coverage (20% each)
PROXY framing is relatively minor across all sources (6.7%-13.3%), with Israeli highest
Clear editorial divergence: Israeli media frames Iran as threat/enemy, Al Jazeera/UK frame as diplomatic actor

ambiguous_cases.decision: DIPLOMATIC - analyzing diplomatic approach rather than threat
ambiguous_cases.alternative: Could be THREAT if interpreted as military strategy
